about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT:


Bundle of unique in-game skins for each heroes from Deck of Ashes! Every skin has a unique status effect and directly affects the gameplay. What could be better then to dress up well before a deadly fight?

A SIMPLE GUIDE HOW TO USE SKINS

THIS DLC INCLUDES:

Digital skins for each Deck of Ashes Hero.

Lucia the Eternal Flame


Priestess of Dragons - Every third card type Strike imposes a Burn on enemy.

Plague Lady - Card type Disease cost 2 mana less.

Vampyro - There is a 15% chance that Strike cards will have a Lifesteal effect.

Warrior of Light - At the start of your turn, increase Crit. Chance by 2% with a 25% chance until the end of battlefield.

Sly the Black Serpent


Shadow Assassin - While you're in Stealth, your Strike cards deal 10% more damage.

Serpent Warrior - At the start of your turn, increase your Dodge By 5% with a 20% chance until the end of your turn.

Battle Alchemist - The cost of consumable items from the Merchant is reduced by 10%.

Buck the Bestial Rage

Ice Rage - As long as you have less than 30% health, you get twice as much Rage.
detailed_description:
A unique and challenging puzzle adventure Tetragon is out now!


About the Game

Bundle of unique in-game skins for each heroes from Deck of Ashes! Every skin has a unique status effect and directly affects the gameplay. What could be better then to dress up well before a deadly fight?

Priestess of Dragons - Every third card type Strike imposes a Burn on enemy.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6490M 256 МБ
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M (512 Мб)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 (1Gb) / Radeon R7 A10-7700K
